thread.section_title: Hotel Le Littre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A bolt - hole in bustling Paris
thread.title_full: A bolt - hole in bustling Paris - Review of Hotel Le Littre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: tstark2017
title: A bolt - hole in bustling Paris
text:
We stayed for 2 nights in March. Beautiful hotel, impeccably clean and well presented. 2 minutes walk from Placide metro station. All staff very friendly and most helpful. Paid extra for room overlooking Eiffel Tower and Montparnasse tower - both illuminated at night. Lovely private terrace with table and chairs - well worth the extra expense for a real treat. Breakfast included - wide selection of hot and cold and served in relaxing and spacious dining area.
Will definitely make this our 'go to ' in Paris.
